verbs.description: [ARG0: ronaldinho] [V: endorses] [ARG1: far - right brazil presidential candidate two - time fifa player of the year ronaldinho has endorsed a far - right candidate in brazil presidential elections jair bolsonaro senate ronaldinho cafu dilma rousseff milan lucas moura president sao paulo tottenham latin america brazil neymar army fernando haddad barcelona the associated press emerson fittipaldi aecio neves]
